demoTestData.title: Physics Mock Test - Mechanics
demoTestData.description: Comprehensive test covering kinematics, dynamics, work energy and power. This test is designed to evaluate your understanding of fundamental mechanics concepts including Newton's laws, projectile motion, and circular motion.
demoTestData.instructions: Read all questions carefully. Each question carries 4 marks. There is negative marking of 1 mark for incorrect answers. Calculator is not allowed.

demoTestData.title: Chemistry Organic Compounds Test
demoTestData.description: Detailed assessment of organic chemistry including hydrocarbons, functional groups, and reaction mechanisms. Focus on IUPAC nomenclature and important organic reactions.
demoTestData.instructions: Answer all questions. Marks will be awarded based on overall performance. Show all working steps clearly.

demoTestData.title: Mathematics Calculus Assessment
demoTestData.description: Advanced calculus test covering limits, derivatives, integrals, and applications. Includes both theoretical concepts and practical problem-solving questions.
demoTestData.instructions: This is an advanced level test. Use of calculator is allowed for numerical calculations. Partial marking available for step-wise solutions.

demoTestData.title: Biology Cell Structure and Function
demoTestData.description: Comprehensive test on cell biology covering cell organelles, membrane transport, cell division, and cellular metabolism. Essential for NEET preparation.
demoTestData.instructions: Answer all questions based on NCERT concepts. Diagrams may be required for some questions. Time management is crucial.

demoTestData.title: English Grammar and Comprehension
demoTestData.description: English language test focusing on grammar, vocabulary, reading comprehension, and writing skills. Designed for Class 10th CBSE students.
demoTestData.instructions: Read passages carefully before answering. Pay attention to grammar rules and sentence construction. Write clearly and legibly.

demoTestData.title: Multi-Subject JEE Mock Test
demoTestData.description: Full-length JEE Main simulation test covering Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics. This test replicates the actual JEE exam pattern and difficulty level.
demoTestData.instructions: This is a full-length JEE Main mock test. Each correct answer carries +4 marks, each incorrect answer carries -1 mark. Unattempted questions carry 0 marks. Managing time effectively is crucial for success.

demoTestData.title: NEET Biology and Chemistry Combined
demoTestData.description: NEET focused test combining Biology and Chemistry questions. Covers important topics from both subjects with emphasis on medical entrance exam patterns.
demoTestData.instructions: NEET pattern test with Biology and Chemistry questions. Each question carries 4 marks with -1 for wrong answers. Focus on accuracy over speed.

demoTestData.title: Class 9th Science Foundation Test
demoTestData.description: Foundation level test for Class 9th students covering basic concepts in Physics, Chemistry, and Biology. Helps in building strong fundamentals.
demoTestData.instructions: Foundation level test for Class 9th. Focus on understanding concepts rather than memorization. No negative marking to encourage learning.
